purpose: Facilitate the creation of robust language processing agents by structuring them as graphs to improve adaptability and scalability.
principle: Builds on graph-based architecture to manage agent interactions and dependencies, leveraging TypeScript for strong typing and maintainability.
reusability: Highly composable with modular components, supports integration via APIs, and is designed for extensibility in various language processing tasks.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, potential for incomplete features and bugs, primarily supports TypeScript environment.
name: langgraphjs
description: Framework to build resilient language agents as graphs.
highlight: Framework for constructing language processing agents as interconnected graph structures, enhancing resilience and modularity.
